body.name: MAM Comfort Baby Pacifier, 100% Lightweight Silicone, Sterilizer Case, 0-3 Months (Pack of 2)

features: LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Best pacifier for breastfed babies as it is 32% lighter than competitive one-piece silicone pacifiers, and specially designed for babies to keep the pacifier in their mouth.
SYMMETRICAL SHAPE: No “right side up” silicone pacifier for babies are fuss-free and won’t need to be adjusted to sit properly in baby’s mouth and fits perfectly under nose for easy breathing.
ONE-PIECE DESIGN: 100% silicone pacifier, these specially-shaped newborn pacifiers guarantee maximum safety and meet the recommendation of the American Academy of Pediatrics.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 0-6 months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
BREATHABLE SHIELD – The air holes on our MAM breastfeed pacifier, for boys and girls, allow for maximum breathability for your newborn baby‘s sensitive skin.
body.description: MAM Comfort newborn pacifiers have a one-piece construction made of 100% silicone, and are on average 36% lighter* than other competitive one-piece pacifiers for breastfed babies. The lightweight design and extra small nipple is very well-accepted by babies and is optimally adapted to the special needs of newborn boys and girls. The extra soft shield has four large air holes to ensure baby's sensitive skin stays dry and comfortable, while the unique MAM shape leaves plenty of room for baby's nose to breathe. The convenient handle is great for attaching a clip to keep baby's silicone pacifier always in reach. Sterilize baby's MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self- sterilizing storage case: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the sterilizing case with the nipple facing down. Follow Start Pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours. *Scientific reports from the WILD Hi-Precision Institute (Austria) confirm that the MAM Comfort is 36% lighter than the average weight of all other tested one-piece silicone pacifiers. Measured weight results: 8.2 g – 18.6 g

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 40 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. Designs May Vary MAM Comfort Newborn Pacifier 2 Comfort Newborn Pacifiers with Sterilizing Case MAM's BPA/BPS-free Comfort Newborn Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 0-4 months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society SkinSoft silicone nipple feels soft and familiar like mom Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Small openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Symmetrical nipple promotes healthy oral development by reducing pressure on incoming teeth SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Light-weight shield ideal for babies 0-4 months old

MAM Start Newborn Pacifier MAM Perfect Start Pacifier MAM Comfort Pacifier MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Mini Air Pacifier Nipple Size Newborn Newborn Newborn 0-6 months 0-6 months SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 2 2 Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for newborn
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and small for newborn babies! I was looking for a pacifier that was small enough for a newborn these worked great! Very easy to clean since they are all one silicone piece and no plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are awesome!
reviews.reviewText: Tiny and very comfy in preemies and newborns mouth, is the only pacifier my daughter and my grandson would take!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Baby Preference
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was really small when she was born and although we breast fed and also bottle fed her, the large pacifiers really bothered her. This was the only pacifier she would take, even being a breastfed baby. I love that they are easy to clean, and we also toss them in the sanitizer as well. The simple design is also nice in comparison to the other MAM styles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shape and can be tethered
reviews.reviewText: We tried a lot of pacifiers. We ended up with this one since baby liked it, it has a slit so it can be tethered to a pacifier clip, and the shape fits babies mouth with the contour instead of flat face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My baby's favorite pacifier. We got one as a sample and decided to get more. It's open on the inside like the soothie, which means the inside can get dirty. I wish the inside was closed off. I like that the case allows for quick sterilization. I wish bottles could be sterilized this easily (mam bottles aren't good for breastfeeding babies)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only pacifiers my baby keeps in her mouth
reviews.reviewText: This brand is great! The free baby registry gift Target gave me had MAM’s bottle that came with a pacifier, and it is the only bottle and pacifier my 5 week old likes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the same shape as original
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to see that mam had started making an all silicone pacifier, as the originals have been my kiddos favorite pacifiers, however these are not the same shape as the original. They are much smaller and more round. I would have kept them and tried them anyway except that my baby is starting to grow out of the smaller size binkie, and this would certainly have been too small. I was unable to find these in a bigger size so I guess I'm going have to hunt around for a similar pacifier brand that's fully silicone. So disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only paci that my granddaughter would take
reviews.reviewText: These packs have a bit of a smaller nipple for babies, breast fed babies in particular. It’s the only one that my granddaughter would use.Highly recommend.
